cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an unknown enum 'unknown' will cause configuration validation errors and prevent proper security setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the physical layer log level to an invalid value 'bad' will cause logging configuration errors and potential physical layer instability.
du.explanation_zh: 將物理層日誌級別設定為無效值 'bad' 會導致日誌配置錯誤，並可能造成物理層不穩定。
